port_select.description: Board port selection with conflict detection

probe_types.description: Probe technology - only one can be active

leveling_types.description: Bed leveling method - determined by Z motor count

homing_methods.description: Z homing method - auto-selected based on probe

options.label: Safe Z Home (standard)
options.condition: probe.probe_type not in ['beacon', 'cartographer'] or (probe.probe_type == 'beacon' and probe.homing_mode == 'proximity') or (probe.probe_type == 'cartographer' and probe.homing_mode == 'scan')

fields.label: Enable Endstop Pull-up
fields.help: Enable internal pull-up resistor (recommended for mechanical switches)

fields.label: Invert Endstop Logic
fields.help: Invert endstop signal (enable for NC switches, disable for NO switches)

fields.label: Invert Enable Pin
fields.help: Invert the motor enable signal (depends on driver board)

fields.label: Invert Direction
fields.help: Invert motor direction if it runs backwards

fields.label: Rotation Distance (mm)
fields.help: For GT2-20T pulley: 40mm

stepper_x1.title: Stepper X1 Configuration (AWD)
stepper_x1.description: X1 shares belt with X - only motor port and direction differ

fields.label: Invert Direction
fields.help: Invert motor direction (usually needed for AWD)

copy_from_option.label: Use same motor settings as Stepper X?
copy_from_option.help: CoreXY typically uses identical motors. Copy driver, microsteps, rotation distance from X.

fields.label: Enable Endstop Pull-up

fields.label: Invert Direction
fields.help: Invert motor direction if it runs backwards

fields.label: Rotation Distance (mm)
fields.help: For GT2-20T pulley: 40mm

stepper_y1.title: Stepper Y1 Configuration (AWD)
stepper_y1.description: Y1 shares belt with Y - only motor port and direction differ

fields.label: Invert Direction
fields.help: Invert motor direction (usually needed for AWD)

fields.label: Enable Endstop Pull-up
fields.help: Enable internal pull-up resistor (recommended for mechanical switches)

fields.label: Invert Endstop Logic
fields.help: Invert endstop signal (enable for NC switches, disable for NO switches)

fields.label: Invert Enable Pin
fields.help: Invert the motor enable signal (depends on driver board)

fields.label: Invert Direction
fields.help: Invert motor direction if it runs backwards

fields.label: Rotation Distance (mm)
fields.help: For T8 leadscrew: 8mm, for belt: 40mm

fields.label: Thermistor Pull-up Resistor
fields.help: Internal pull-up resistor value for thermistor ADC input

fields.label: Invert Heater Pin
fields.help: Invert heater output signal (rarely needed)

fields.label: Invert Enable Pin
fields.help: Invert the motor enable signal (depends on driver board)

fields.label: Invert Direction
fields.help: Invert motor direction for correct extrusion

fields.label: Thermistor Pull-up Resistor
fields.help: Internal pull-up resistor value for thermistor ADC input

fields.label: Invert Heater Pin
fields.help: Invert heater output signal (rarely needed)

fields.label: Invert Fan Pin
fields.help: Invert fan PWM signal (rarely needed)

fields.label: Invert Fan Pin
fields.help: Invert fan PWM signal (rarely needed)

pin_conflicts.description: Pin conflicts are detected at runtime by PinManager

logical_conflicts.condition: probe.probe_type == 'beacon' and probe.homing_mode == 'contact' and macros.extruder_preheat_temp >= probe.contact_max_hotend_temperature - 5
logical_conflicts.message: Preheat temp is too close to Beacon contact limit. PID overshoot may cause probing rejection.
Quad Gantry Level requires exactly 4 Z motors.
Z Tilt Adjust requires 2 or 3 Z motors.
Sensorless homing requires a TMC driver with StallGuard support.
Toolboard features require a toolboard to be enabled.
